summary: A suite of Django test cases that validate fixture loading and dumping, focusing on natural key handling, many‑to‑many relationships, dependency ordering, circular reference detection, serialization/deserialization, and cross‑application fixture path resolution.
business_intent: Provide automated regression tests to ensure Django's fixture system works reliably across various scenarios, including natural keys, complex relationships, and platform‑specific path handling, thereby preventing regressions and bugs in fixture processing.
